author: Thomas
content:
Oh yeah, Morrowind is a real classic (so is Oblivion). And it really eats time like nothing else (mhh, except perhaps Civilization in one of its many incarnations). But you seem to have had great weather when you re-surfaced.

Now that I think of it, a weekend spent in Morrowind and topped with some hours of photography... Oh, life could be worse.
